title: The Nasty girl = Das schreckliche Madchen
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945 - Germany
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/National socialism
description: Sonja (Lena Stolze) is the pride of her small German town. She's innocent, intelligent and a European essay competition winner. However, as she grows older, and wants to write about a new subject, "My hometown during the Third Reich", Sonja finds the whole town turning against her. Fearful of the secrets she may uncover, they abuse and harass this "troublemaker in a skirt", denying her access to the town records so her story is never written. She must use all her wit and determination to uncover the truth in this intriguing comedy with a twist!
